name: Net and Stab
flavor: The well-thrown net that follows your main attack leaves your foes right where you want them.

metadata.flavor: The well-thrown net that follows your main attack leaves your foes right where you want them.

effects.tier1: 4 + M or A damage; A < WEAK, slowed (EoT)
effects.tier2: 6 + M or A damage; A < AVERAGE, slowed (EoT)
effects.tier3: 8 + M or A damage; A < STRONG, restrained (EoT)
